Function reference

Chart

Crafted visualisation charts based on the data type

plot_integer()
Plotting numeric variable
plot_select_multiple()
Plotting Select multiple variable
plot_select_multiple_cross()
Plotting Select multiple variable
plot_select_one()
Plotting Select one variable
plot_select_one_cross()
Plotting Select one variable
plot_text()
Plotting Open Text variables

Labeling

Functions to relabel both variables and choices

label_choice()
Get the label for a specific choice if available
label_choiceset()
Get all the choices labels options for a specific variable
label_varhint()
Get Interpretation hint for a specific variable
label_varname()
Get the label for a specific variable

Crunching

Functions to automate the processing

kobo_cruncher()
Crunch a variable
kobo_data()
Data loading
kobo_dico()
Prepare Analysis plan
kobo_frame()
get the correct frame for one selected variable - important when havving variables within a repeat

Report Template

Prebuild Report template to explore, interpret & Disseminate

template_dissemination()
Function for UNHCR paged simple template
template_exploration()
Convert to UNHCR branded HTML website
template_interpretation()
Convert to UNHCR branded Powerpoint presentation
